channel.title: Development: LuredScape V1 Source!
channel.description:
Hey Everyone! Well after several attempts at running a no-ip server i successfully FAILED :(. So i decided to put my amatuer coding skills to the test by making my own source! I'm not sure how it will go but i will take it one thing at a time and hopefully succeed. If it all works out i will glady post it in the "downloads" forum for everyone to use! NEWS: Fixed my "runserver"! Staring project now! :)
[u][b]The Approach:[/b][/u] I will be taking FigmentScape V4.5 and be changing just about everything! From new shops, training areas and even a never before seen Multi Pking area!
Red = Not Complete Orange = In Progress Green = Complete
[u][b]Future Updates:[/b][/u] ~New Non-leeched home!~ ~New Training Area~ ~New Shops~ ~New Multi Pking Area! (Never before seen)~ ~New Staff Zone~ And more to come!
[u][b]My Resources![/b][/u] - MoparScape Forums -
As i said before, i am semi-new to coding and will need tons of help along the way! Thankyou everyone beforehand! Also a special thanks to Figment and his V4.5 Source! (yes, i will give him credit for this project of mine)
With all that said, my adventure begins now! Thank you for reading! :)
P.S. Feel free to post suggestions on locations for anything. [b]~I Lured I~[/b]

item.title: Development: LuredScape V1 Source!
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:7, topic:218840”][quote author=i lured i link=topic=287542.msg2325842#msg2325842 date=1215682701]
I am planning on adding stuff to my list as i go. That is just somthing to start with.
Although it might seem easy to you, i’m fairly new to coding.

~Affinity~
[/quote]
I understood you were fairly new, I was just stating that really - it’s sometimes easier to do somethings alone. I’m not saying not to get people to help - but essentially you learn more when you do some things yourself that require you to learn more in order to do that thing. :)[/quote] Good point I think i might narrow my help down to these forums.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

i lured i:

Hey Everyone! Well after several attempts at running a no-ip server i successfully FAILED

No-ip is just a redirection service.

Also, your future update list isn’t a lot, but anywho good luck I guess. You shouldn’t need any help yet, though whatever floats yer boat (less people who help and more you make yourself - more creds to you, right? heh).

Hey Everyone! Well after several attempts at running a no-ip server i successfully FAILED :(. So i decided to put my amatuer coding skills to the test by making my own source! I’m not sure how it will go but i will take it one thing at a time and hopefully succeed. If it all works out i will glady post it in the “downloads” forum for everyone to use!
NEWS: Fixed my “runserver”! Staring project now!

The Approach: I will be taking FigmentScape V4.5 and be changing just about everything! From new shops, training areas and even a never before seen Multi Pking area!

Red = Not Complete
Orange = In Progress
Green = Complete

Future Updates:
~New Non-leeched home!~
~New Training Area~
~New Shops~
~New Multi Pking Area! (Never before seen)~

With all that said, my adventure begins now! Thank you for reading!
